In a school, students are imposed a penalty for delay in the submission of library books:
Penalty for the first day is Rs _{j}_, for the second day Rs _{{j+k}}_ and similarly the penalty for each succeeding day being Rs _{k}_ more than previous day.
Govind has delayed the submission of his book by _{l}_ days.
How much money he has to pay as penalty to the school library?
